textimage-01.text:
The Composum Platform is a Web application platform based on the Apache Sling framework. The platform support content management, asset management and fast application development.

There are four modules available:

  • Composum Nodes
    the core API on the JCR level with the Composum Console as the central 'Swiss Knife' to manipulate the repository resources and with the Package Manager
  • Platform Module
    the Package to set up a software platform with the access manager and the release delivery service (the staging aproach of the Composum Platform)
  • Clientlibs
    sets of Javascript and CSS files combined by the pieces in the components and delivered as assets appropriate to a rendered page
  • Composum Pages
    the content management package of the Composum Platform with the Pages Stage editing user interface to manage your content
textimage-01.title: Composum Platform

composum_pages.text:
Pages is the brand new module which provides a CMS UI to manipulate your content in an intuitive way. the content is organized in

  • Sites
    the managing entry point to one site on the platform which contains all pages and assets and declares the releases, languages and mapping rules for the internet site
  • Pages
    the versioned content of a site is structured in a hierarchy of pages
  • Containers
    are arranging sets of elements e.g. paragraph systems element lists, slideshows, accordions, ...
  • Elements
    are more or less complex components without the ability to arrange elements within
  • Components
    the known Sling components referenced by pages, containers and elements as the resource types
